sections.content:
Question:
Can you explain what is the new Entry-Line in the RA Family?
Answer:
The RA4E2 and RA6E2 are the 2nd generation Entry-Line MCUs in the RA4 and RA6 series.
The RA4E2 and RA6E2 offer new levels of CPU performance and functionality in compact packages, supporting packages as small as 4 mm x 4 mm, while offering the ARM Cortex- M33 core with operating speeds of 100 MHz for the RA4E2 and 200 MHz for the RA6E2.
Suitable Products
RA4E2, RA6E2
